<h1 align="center">
  Test Blog
</h1>

Blog application built to practice using Gatsby.  Modified colors, changed the blog posts, edited the author and explored the build and concepts behind Gatsby with this tutorial video:

[Learn Gatsby](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xJVHWhO9bJY)



## Commands to Build Blog

1.  **Create a Gatsby site.**

    Use the Gatsby CLI to create a new site, specifying the blog starter.

    ```shell
    # create a new Gatsby site using the blog starter
    gatsby new my-blog-starter https://github.com/gatsbyjs/gatsby-starter-blog
    ```

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```
